entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:13 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -28.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peace River Airport 8:12 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -28.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -32.1°C
Wind: N 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 31.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:09 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:09 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:09 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
